sn35.229:1.4: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.229:1.5: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddo.
sn35.229:1.6: Etthayam sadevako loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa yebhuyyena samunna tantakulakajata kulaganthikajata munjapabbajabhuta, apayam duggatim vinipatam samsaram nativattati …pe….
sn35.229:2.1: Santi, bhikkhave, jivhavinneyya rasa …pe… santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.229:2.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye samuddo.
sn35.229:2.3: Etthayam sadevako loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa yebhuyyena samunna tantakulakajata kulaganthikajata munjapabbajabhuta apayam duggatim vinipatam samsaram nativattatiti.
